_metadata.title: QIF Project Timeline
_metadata.description: Chronological record of QIF milestones, discoveries, dataset growth, and major updates. Updated when significant changes occur. Automation: scripts/timeline-check.mjs detects staleness.

milestones.title: TARA v1.0: Initial Atlas Published
milestones.description: First public release of the Therapeutic Applications & Risk Assessment atlas. 60 attack techniques. The starting point.

milestones.title: ONI Framework Repository Created
milestones.description: First commit of the original ONI (Open Neural Interface) framework. Predecessor to QIF. 14-layer OSI model. Zero framework, zero scoring, just a question: what does security look like when the endpoint is a human brain?

milestones.title: ONI Demo Video v1.0 Complete
milestones.description: 3:56 animated explainer (Remotion + ElevenLabs). L1-L14 visualization, coherence gauge. First public-facing media.

milestones.title: Qinnovate Website Repository Created
milestones.description: First commit to the qinnovate.com website. Astro 5.x + React 19 + TailwindCSS 4. The public face of the project.

milestones.title: QIF Born: 14-Layer Model Deprecated, Hourglass Adopted
milestones.description: Single session produced 13 derivation insights. CNF renamed to QIF. 14-layer OSI model (v2.0) deprecated in favor of the 7-band symmetric (3-1-3) hourglass. QIF-TRUTH.md created as canonical source of truth.

milestones.title: First Cross-AI Validation (Gemini 2.5)
milestones.description: Independent AI peer review by Gemini 2.5 of the hourglass model. Validation pipeline established.

milestones.title: Hamiltonian Root: QI Grounded in Physics Formalism
milestones.description: The QI equation grounded in Hamiltonian formalism. Not a heuristic score but a quantity derived from the system's energy landscape. The unifying mathematical root.

milestones.title: L=v/f Unification and 11-Band Model
milestones.description: Wavelength equation applied to neural security. Government-restricted spectrum attack mapping added. QIF v4.0: 11 bands implemented (N7-N1, I0, S1-S3). Five coupling mechanisms identified.

milestones.title: NSP Formalized: 6-Layer Validation Stack
milestones.description: Neural Sensory Protocol designed as a 6-layer validation stack. Physics-based authentication using spectral invariants, microstate compliance, and challenge-response. Biological TLS.

milestones.title: NSP Goes Post-Quantum
milestones.description: Neural data has a decades-long sensitivity window. Harvest-Now-Decrypt-Later threat model adopted. ML-KEM/ML-DSA integrated. 5 defense layers, Merkle-amortized SPHINCS+ signatures.

milestones.title: Black Hole Security Principle
milestones.description: Hawking/Susskind/Maldacena information principles applied to BCI security boundaries. Novel theoretical contribution.

milestones.title: Unified Neural Security Taxonomy
milestones.description: 60 attack techniques across 11 MITRE-compatible tactics spanning 7 domains. First structured BCI threat taxonomy.

milestones.title: NISS Created: BCI-Specific Severity Scoring
milestones.description: NISS (Neural Impact Scoring System) created because CVSS cannot account for biological reversibility, cognitive integrity impact, or neural tissue interaction. A severity metric built for brains, not servers.

milestones.title: First Multi-Model Validation Cycle
milestones.description: QwQ-32B, Grok-3, DeepSeek-R1, WhiteRabbitNeo, and Gemini independently reviewed QIF framework. Consensus reached on hourglass model validity. 5 errors corrected.

milestones.title: Project Runemate Conceived
milestones.description: Runemate DSL conceived: a domain-specific language for neural rendering. 3-pass Gemini review. NSP unification confirmed.

milestones.title: NISS v1.0 Finalized
milestones.description: Spectral decomposition bridge connects raw neural signals to per-band QI scoring. Every technique scored for neural impact. Replaces CVSS for BCI context.

milestones.title: Dynamical Systems Security: 6 New Attack Classes
milestones.description: Bifurcation manipulation, basin erosion, strange attractor injection, Lyapunov destabilization, phase space compression, and resonance entrainment. Novel BCI attack vectors from dynamical systems theory.

milestones.title: TARA Reframe: Threat Catalog Becomes Therapeutic Atlas
milestones.description: Attack techniques reframed as dual-use: every neural attack has a therapeutic analog. 35-40 therapeutic counterparts, 10 ambiguous, 18 silicon-only. Registry transformed from threat catalog to risk-benefit atlas.

milestones.title: Framework Complete (v1): QIF + NSP + NISS + TARA
milestones.description: First complete version of the full stack. 50 derivation log entries. 7 days of formal derivation. 4 framework versions. Ready for independent peer review.

milestones.title: TARA v1.3: S-Domain Consumer Sensor Expansion
milestones.description: Consumer device attack surface expanded. Synthetic band techniques for off-the-shelf sensors.

milestones.title: TARA v1.4: Consumer Side-Channel Techniques
milestones.description: 3 new techniques (T0100-T0102). Total: 102 techniques.

milestones.title: TARA-to-DSM-5-TR Diagnostic Mapping
milestones.description: Neural Impact Chain bridges attack techniques to DSM-5-TR diagnostic codes. 5 diagnostic clusters, 68 DSM codes mapped. Every TARA technique now maps to potential psychiatric outcomes.

milestones.title: Three Floors of Physics Integration
milestones.description: Landauer limit, Margolus-Levitin bound, and Heisenberg uncertainty integrated into QIF constraint system. P=E/t computational scaling equation derived.

milestones.title: NSP Core Implementation: Rust ML-KEM + ML-DSA
milestones.description: Post-quantum handshake implemented in Rust. ML-KEM-768 key exchange and ML-DSA-65 signatures working end-to-end. The cryptographic layer is real code, not just a spec.

milestones.title: Runemate Forge + NSP Integration Verified
milestones.description: End-to-end secure neural pipeline: HTML content compiled to Runemate Staves bytecode, encrypted via NSP post-quantum handshake, decrypted and rendered on target.

milestones.title: Zenodo Preprint v1.0 Published
milestones.description: First public preprint: 28 pages, 6 figures, CC-BY-4.0. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18640106. 3 fabricated citations discovered and disclosed.

milestones.title: TARA v1.5: Neurorights Mapping
milestones.description: 4 neurorights (Mental Privacy, Cognitive Liberty, Mental Integrity, Psychological Continuity) mapped to all 102 techniques. Consent Complexity Index (CCI) introduced.

milestones.title: TARA v1.6: FDORA Regulatory Compliance
milestones.description: FDORA Section 3305 (Patch Act) coverage mapped to all techniques. Regulatory gap analysis complete.

milestones.title: BCI Hardware Inventory Published
milestones.description: 24 BCI devices catalogued from FDA filings, manufacturer datasheets, and peer-reviewed papers. Full specs with confidence levels.

milestones.title: Brain-BCI Atlas v1.2.0
milestones.description: 38 brain structures mapped to BCI devices, QIF bands, neural latency metrics, and physics constraints.

milestones.title: BCI Limits Equation Synthesized
milestones.description: 13 physics constraints unified into a single system coupling thermodynamics, EM, Moore's Law, Shannon safety, Boltzmann detectability, and QIF coherence. No published paper unifies all 13.

milestones.title: Physics Feasibility Tiering Complete
milestones.description: All 102 TARA techniques classified by physics feasibility tier. 61 feasible now, 11 near-term, 10 mid-term, 2 far-term, 18 no physics gate.

milestones.title: SSVEP Frequency Hijack (T0103)
milestones.description: Novel attack technique: hijacking steady-state visually evoked potentials via imperceptible screen flicker. Validated by Ming et al. (2023). 103rd technique added.

milestones.title: Zenodo Preprint v1.4 Published
milestones.description: NISS score corrections (arithmetic mean), TMS citation fix, dual-use label fix, Sherman & Guillery citation added. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18677997

milestones.title: NSP Protocol Spec v0.5 Finalized
milestones.description: Protocol core and handshake complete. 5-layer defense stack, 3 device tiers, power budget validated at 3.25% of 40 mW.

milestones.title: Neurowall v0.7: Signal Integrity Monitor
milestones.description: 3-layer coherence monitor built from v0.1 to v0.7 in a single day. Multi-band EEG, spectral peak detection, CUSUM change detection, ROC analysis. 7/9 attacks detected at 15s, 9/9 at 30s. 14 attack generators in neurosim toolkit.

milestones.title: BrainFlow Real Hardware Validation
milestones.description: First test of Neurowall on actual EEG hardware (OpenBCI Cyton via BrainFlow). 5/5 attacks detected, 0% false positive rate. Coherence monitor works on real signals, not just synthetic.

milestones.title: BCI Limits Equation Cross-Validated (Gemini 2.5 Pro)
milestones.description: 12/13 constraints verified correct. 2 corrections applied: mechanical mismatch ratio inverted, Johnson noise temperature corrected to 310K.

milestones.title: Validation Dashboard + TARA Badges
milestones.description: Living validation system tracking cross-AI validation sessions, citation checks, and fact verification. Status badges added to every TARA technique page.

milestones.title: Repository Consolidation: 17 Directories to 8
milestones.description: Major repo restructure. Autodidactive removed, governance merged, archives cleaned. 11 READMEs and tables of contents written. Neurorights map added to root README.

milestones.title: Unified QIF API (/api/qif.json)
milestones.description: Single endpoint serving all QIF data: 103 threats, 24 devices, 38 brain regions, 13 physics constraints, scoring specs, timeline. CORS-enabled, open access. ~580 KB.

milestones.title: BCI Research Hub Launched
milestones.description: Dedicated /bci/ section consolidating hardware explorer, limits equation, security guardrails, and API documentation under one roof.

milestones.title: Automation Registry + Timeline Tracking
milestones.description: 30 automations catalogued (10 active workflows, 8 disabled, 6 scripts, 4 planned). Timeline staleness detection automated. Self-updating registry via daily GitHub Action.

milestones.title: TARA v1.7: Origin Classification + 6 New Techniques
milestones.description: All 109 techniques tagged with origin provenance (literature, qif_recontextualized, qif_chain_synthesis, qif_theoretical, neuroethics_formalized). Original authors credited. 6 new techniques added (T0104-T0109): 4 from Murcia/Lopez Bernal taxonomy gap, 1 neuromorphic mimicry, 1 data alignment exploitation. 24 new research sources added (165 to 193).

milestones.title: Neurowall v0.8: RunematePolicy Engine
milestones.description: L3 policy agent replaced 14-line if/else stub with a full rule-stack engine. 5 prioritized rules (critical_niss, high_niss, sustained_anomaly, growth_detected, spectral_peak) with cooldown, sustained window tracking, stimulation suppression, and configurable policy stacks. Gemini-validated (Phase 11).
